termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions of Use for Invite Me
termsAndConditions.welcome: Welcome to Invite Me. By registering and using our platform, you agree to comply with the following Terms and Conditions. We recommend you read this document carefully before using our services.

generalInfo.title: 1. General Information
generalInfo.content: Invite Me is a social network designed to help you share experiences, connect with friends, and access personalized content based on your location. By using Invite Me, you agree to our privacy policies, terms of use, and all applicable regulations.

dataCollection.title: 2. Collection and Use of Personal Data
dataCollection.content: To provide you with an optimal experience, Invite Me collects and processes personal data under strict security measures and in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). By accepting these terms, you authorize the collection, storage, and use of your personal data as specified below:

bullets.registration: • Registration data: Name, email address, date of birth, and gender, necessary for identification and personalization of your experience.
bullets.photos: • Photos and gallery access: We request access to your gallery to allow you to upload images and share moments. This permission can be managed from your device settings.
bullets.location: • Real-time location: We request your location to provide you with relevant content, such as events, recommendations, and nearby connections. You can manage this permission at any time from your device settings.
bullets.notifications: • Notifications: We will send notifications to inform you about messages, events, and updates. You can manage your preferences in your device settings.

dataProtection.title: 3. Data Protection and Storage
dataProtection.content: Invite Me employs all appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect our users' personal data. However, we cannot guarantee absolute security against external attacks or unforeseen incidents beyond our reasonable control. In the event of a significant security breach, we will act in accordance with applicable laws, informing users and competent authorities as soon as possible.

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use of the Application
acceptableUse.content: The use of Invite Me must be respectful and responsible. We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts that violate our community standards, including:

bullets.language: • Use of offensive, inappropriate, or intimidating language.
bullets.harassment: • Use of the platform to harass or intimidate other users.
bullets.content: • Posting illegal content, copyright infringement, or content that does not comply with our standards.

reporting.title: 5. Reporting System and Moderation
reporting.content: Invite Me allows users to report inappropriate behavior anonymously. Reports will be handled by our support team in accordance with our privacy policies and confidentially. False reports may result in penalties.

userRights.title: 6. User Rights
userRights.content: In accordance with the GDPR, Invite Me users have the following rights regarding their personal data:

bullets.access: • Access and Rectification: You can review and correct your information at any time from your profile settings.
bullets.deletion: • Account and associated data deletion: You can request the deletion of your account, which will remove your personal data from our systems, except in cases where it is necessary to retain them for legal reasons.
bullets.permissions: • Revocation of permissions: You can manage and revoke permissions (such as location and notifications) from your device settings.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property and User Content
intellectualProperty.content: The intellectual property rights to the content you share on Invite Me belong to you. However, by posting content on our platform, you grant Invite Me a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, and distribute such content for operational and promotional purposes, in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Invite Me does not guarantee uninterrupted availability of its services. In no event will we be liable for indirect damages or loss of profits arising from the use or misuse of the platform.

modifications.title: 9. Modifications to the Terms and Conditions
modifications.content: Invite Me may modify these terms at any time to adapt them to changes in legislation or our services. We will notify users of any significant changes and require their acceptance to continue using the platform.

contact.title: 10. Contact and Customer Support
contact.content: For any questions or requests related to your rights, you can contact our support team at: iiinvitee.me@gmail.com.

termsAndConditions.agreement: By accepting and using Invite Me, you confirm that you have read and understood these Terms and Conditions and agree to comply with them in their entirety.

questions.about: Share a bit about yourself, your hobbies, interests, and what you enjoy most. This will help personalize your profile!

questions.hobbies: What's two of your favourite hobbies?

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidUsername: Username must be 1-30 characters long and can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, periods, and underscores
errors.invalidPassword: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character
errors.termsNotAccepted: Please accept the terms and conditions
errors.invalidHobbies: Hobbies must be single words without spaces or numbers
errors.invalidInterests: Interests must be single words without spaces or numbers
errors.emailInUse: This email is already in use.
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

welcome.title: You're in!
welcome.subtitle: Welcome to Invite Me, Where great experiences await you.

1.description: Swipe through to discover the app's features and learn how to make the most of your experience.

2.topText: Home is your go-to spot for exploring your favourite places and the hottest events in town.
2.bottomText: Select where you'll be so your friends can easily see what you're up to as you dive into the city's coolest happenings!

3.topText: By selecting the events you plan to attend on Home, your profile will showcase where you're headed, letting others join in on the fun and see your exciting plans!
3.bottomText: It's also all about your favorite spots-the places you love and what matches your vibe perfectly. Plus, it captures who you are, celebrating all the unique details that make you, you.

4.topText: If you prefer, you can set your account to private. Others who are not your friend will view it like this.
4.bottomText: This also means that only your friends will be able to see where you're going, both here and in Home.

5.topText: In the Chat section, share your mood and see how others are feeling! Respond or like their vibes and connect with friends in a fun way.

6.topText: In Stories, you can see who's sharing their moments, and if you want to keep your favorites close, just fixate on someone! They'll always appear at the top for easy access.

7.topText: In the menu, you can find exactly what you're in the mood for whether it's dining out, grabbing a drink, or hitting up a club. You can also create your own events and explore much more.
7.bottomText: Plus, you can search in other cities to see what's happening elsewhere. Whether you're planning a trip or just curious about what's going on, you can check out events in advance and see who you might meet there.

8.topText: With 'Create My Own Event', you have the freedom to host your own gatherings, whether it's a private party or a special celebration.
8.bottomText: You can customize the event details and even make it a private affair by inviting only the people you want to share the experience with. It's your event, your way-designed to bring the right people together.
